quotes: At the Program on States and Security meeting in April 2008, you spoke at length about the process of constructing a vision plan for Timor Leste’s future and the trouble you encountered while attempting to achieve this.

organizations.name: World Bank
quotes: to be struggling with all these other people who were normal public servants of the Indonesian time. Now, I kept asking the World Bank, “Where is this committee, this board, the coordinating board?” But they never really answered.

organizations.name: TFET
quotes: I didn’t realize that they already set up the TFET and the TFET was it. Meanwhile Sergio de Mello was setting up the structure of the government.

organizations.name: National Agency for Planning and Development
quotes: And that is how they created the [National Agency for Planning and Development] agency. That was the coordinating body.

organizations.name: UNTAET
quotes: So, the two things were kind of dysfunctional in the sense that the structure was with UNTAET, but the money was with the World Bank.

organizations.name: Program on States and Security
quotes: At the Program on States and Security meeting in April 2008, you spoke at length about the process of constructing a vision plan for Timor Leste’s future and the trouble you encountered while attempting to achieve this.

organizations.name: JAM
quotes: If the JAM had continued it would have been much better because then you would have really had Timorese running things, but Timorese were only there for three months.

roles.title: head of the National Agency for Planning and Development
quotes: I did become the head of that, but then this was within UNTAET’s structure, not TFET.

At the Program on States and Security meeting in April 2008, you spoke at length about the process of constructing a vision plan for Timor Leste’s future and the trouble you encountered while attempting to achieve this.

supporting_quotes: I did become the head of that, but then this was within UNTAET’s structure, not TFET.
